nodes.title: Santorini
nodes.excerpt: In Santorini the Volta4u main station is located right outside the airport’s arrival halls within walking distance (25mrs). We are open and waiting for you from 8:00am to 21:00pm all year round. You can view our station on Google maps by clicking here.

nodes.title: Mykonos
nodes.excerpt: In Mykonos there are two ways you can find us. Usually we meet you by flight details at the airport’s arrivals hall. Our main station is located in Omvrodektis. We are open and waiting for you from 08:00am to 21:00pm all year round. You can view our station on Google maps by clicking here.
